description:
Are you fed up learning programming from scratch? Then this course is for you!

Simply because someone knows how to program doesn't mean that they'll create breakthrough applications. I have seen lots of developers spend hundreds, if not thousands, of hours coding in the hope of creating a popular application - all to see their app dwindle in popularity at exponential rates with nothing to show.

Have you ever considered how long it would take you to develop a game like Flappy Bird? I'm not just talking about the code - I'm talking about a full-fledged publishing into a competitive market. It's no easy task.

Here, I provide you with the lectures to SAVE countless hours on code development to focus on what truly matters.

In this course you will learn

- How To Make Professional Android Applications Without Coding

- How To Make Professional Android Games Without Coding

- How To Publish Your Application To Google Play Store

- How To Make Money Developing Android Applications

- How To Rank Your Application In Google Play Store

- And much more!

Over my years as a developer, I have created many apps, one of which has more than 80,000 downloads in Google play store with a rating of 4.4. You will learn exactly how I went about in creating a successful app.

What if I told you that after this course you will be able to develop a game like flappy bird, including a beautiful UI, and publish it in the Google Play Store in one day - without coding a single line! It's possible and I will show you how.

This is not a joke. I am simply opening your mind to a different and more efficient method of succeeding in the increasingly competitive world of application development. You will learn about the tools which will allow you to succeed without ever needing to program.

Don't waste your time anymore writing code, join my course and I will show you how to save your time and make money developing professional android games and applications.
title: Android Development Without Coding: Develop Quick And Earn
